EmailTemplate.name: MBO Enrollment (1343420648.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Enrollment (1343420648.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kelly, No problem at all it is my pleasure. The last step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kelly Pavela [mailto:kelly.pavela@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 27, 2012 3:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: FW: MBO MSA Yes, thank you. Sorry it took so long to get back to you...the message got lost in my e-mail. By the way, thanks for all your help on this, I appreciate it. Regards, Kelly On Fri, Jul 27, 2012 at 11:20 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kelly, Do I have your permission to sign? Thanks,Sara From: Tim Holmes [mailto:THolmes@paragontech.net <mailto:THolmes@paragontech.net>] Sent: Friday, July 27, 2012 10:58 AM To: Sara Conde; Danielle Clay Cc: kelly.pavela@gmail.com <mailto:kelly.pavela@gmail.com> Subject: RE: MBO MSA Sara, Signed copy of the SOW is attached. Please return fully executed copy to my and Danielle’s attention. Best Regards,Tim Holmes | Vice President, Contracts and Legal8229 Boone Blvd, Suite 700 | Vienna, VA 22182D: 703-462-6167 <tel:703-462-6167> | F: 703-734-1106 <tel:703-734-1106> | C: 202-251-1196 <tel:202-251-1196>tholmes@paragontech.net <mailto:tholmes@paragontech.net> We are an equal opportunity employer M/F/D/VCONFIDENTIALITY: THIS COMMUNICATION IS BEING SENT FROM PARAGON AND MAY CONTAIN INFORMATION THAT IS CONFIDENTIAL OR PRIVILEGED. The Sow is a word doc so you can make the change then print to PDF to sign. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thanks!Sara From: Danielle Clay [mailto:dclay@paragontech.net] <mailto:[mailto:dclay@paragontech.net]> Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 3:25 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Tim Holmes; kelly.pavela@gmail.com <mailto:kelly.pavela@gmail.com> Subject: RE: MBO MSA Hi Sara-Will you be sending us an updated document with Tim’s changes? From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 3:17 PM To: Danielle Clay Cc: Tim Holmes; kelly.pavela@gmail.com <mailto:kelly.pavela@gmail.com> Subject: RE: MBO MSA Hi Guys, Just wanted to add that we would like weekly invoicing frequency, please make sure to mark that in the SOW. Thank you,Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 2:20 PM To: 'Danielle Clay' Cc: Tim Holmes; 'kelly.pavela@gmail.com <mailto:kelly.pavela@gmail.com>' Subject: RE: MBO MSA Hi Danielle and Tim, Thank you for turning this around so quickly. All changes were accepted with the exception of the proposed removal of “if MBO can recover the expenditure from the Associate.” in section 9. Once services are accepted and paid, we cannot accommodate refunds as we have already paid consultants for their labor and expenses. If you agree please sign the attached and return fully executed copy via email. Net 30 payment terms are fine, please find updated SOW attached, complete sign and return this as well. Thank you,Sara From: Danielle Clay [mailto:dclay@paragontech.net] <mailto:[mailto:dclay@paragontech.net]> Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 1:33 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Tim Holmes Subject: MBO MSA Hi Sara-Please see the mark up of the agreement from our VP of Contracts and Legal. We also need to note that we have 30 day payment terms.
